TopicTitle: Do we have a list of current mods that have been updated for the recent .22 update?

Articles.Content: First, if we already have one please redirect me to it. If we don't, can we make one? I think it would benefit everyone. Thanks.
Haven't seen a list. MechJeb is but ONLY the latest devbuild from the forums is compatible.

If it was working just before 0.22 is should still work...even most plugins seem to have come through this update unscathed. The only thing that needs to be added is 2 lines in part config...and thats only if the part needs to be in career mode.

Other than that best bet is look through the first few pages of 'addon release' forum, as most updated mods have thread titles to reflect such.

Haven't seen a list. MechJeb is but ONLY the latest devbuild from the forums is compatible.

Unless you really like watching the Gemini capsule do a great imitation of a washing machine agitator, then use an old version.

Magic Smoke Industries Infernal robotics and Reflaginator both work without an update. I will however release an update for Reflaginator because of a harmless exception that occurs that I missed but it all works fine.

I pretty much copied all of my mods straight over to my non-stock install. The only one I noticed that acted strange was the SelectRoot plugin, but that one had already been updated to 0.22 anyway, so I overwrote the old version with the new one.

Other than that, apart from parts not showing up in Career Mode for older mods (which I can fix myself anyway), no problems.
